processing_rule: Check the uplink (UL) RSSI level of the cell.  If the UL RSSI level is outside of the normal boundaries of -120 and -114, check the uplink configuration and see if the pZeroNominalPucch value is close to the optimal -114 and pZeroNominalPusch is close to the optimal -100 values. Consider adjusting these configurations if they differ from the optimal by more than 5%.
severity_determination_rule: If retainability level is greater than 3.5  it is a high severity case. If the uplink (UL) RSSI lovel is lower than -120 the incident is of a medium severity. If the UL RSSI level above -105 it is a high severity case. Any other values mean that this is a low severity incident.
author: Acme Telco Appliances
